channel.title: Espeon special drain

item.title: Espeon special drain
item.dc:creator: @evil_ubnub evil ubnub
item.description:
@evil_ubnub wrote:

hello i really need help i have espeon source client and i made new custom item and it’s rune calws and the special wont go down just goes up like normal like if u werent useing the special at all here’s what it looks like in player combat.

                        case 3101:
					/**
					 * rune claws
					 */
					p.requestGFX(823, 100);
					p.requestAnim(4959, 0);
					pm.setSpecDelay(2);
					isSpecWep = true;

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 11, 2009, 08:05:26 pm[/size][hr]wow fags no one helps u on this shit no wonder every body uses runeloucs[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 17, 2009, 04:08:12 am[/size][hr]e[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2009, 12:39:19 pm[/size][hr]fuck u all!!!
